name: xlinuxsms
short_description:
xlinuxsms is a graphical frontend (GUI) to linuxsms which can send short messages (aka SMS) to mobiles over free internet based services.
xlinuxsms is written in Perl/Tk and for those who dont like to mess with the commandline options of
